offer_summary.job_description: Leadership role for implementing technology strategy and executing digital platforms in e-commerce.
requirements: 10+ years' experience working in software development
Proven track record of building technology development teams
Experience working across multiple time zones
Broad understanding of IT principles, frameworks and methodologies
Comprehensive understanding of cloud technologies, AWS
Experience across JavaScript frontend technologies, SAP Hybris and Commerce tools
10+ years working in complex eCommerce organisations
Strong leadership capability demonstrated through previous experience
requierd_skills: Customer-focused with a deep understanding of modern technology stack and agile delivery models
Exceptional abilities in building and maintaining strong working relationships
nice_to_have_skills: Ability to attract, retain, and develop engineering talent
benefits: Sharing the costs of sports activities
Sharing the costs of professional training & courses
